name: @cismet-collab/ais-generic-texts
description: base text library for creating rainhazardmaps help components

scripts.postbuild: ls -d build > /dev/null && git rev-parse --short HEAD && echo $npm_package_version && git rev-parse --short HEAD > build/githash && echo $npm_package_version > build/version
scripts._prebuild: githash=`git rev-parse --short HEAD`; version=$npm_package_version && echo const version=\'$version\'\; const hash=\'$githash\'\; export {version, hash}\; > src/lib/meta.js
scripts.build:package: rm -rf dist/* && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --copy-files  --source-maps both --ignore *.stories.js,__tests__,spec.js,test.js,__snapshots__ && yarn run copypackage
scripts.postversion: echo Postversionhook && rm -f .version ; rm -f .githash ; rm -f .gitdescribe; sed '/^.*"version":.*$/d' package.json > .package.json.without.version && echo $npm_package_version && echo $npm_package_version > .version && git rev-parse HEAD > .githash && echo $(git describe --always --tags) | sed 's/^v//' > .gitdescribe
scripts.dist: yarn build:package && cd dist && npm publish --access public
